review.title: “Good place for freshers to start. Awesome opportunities.”
review.pros: Pros – Lots of opportunities with less time so the rate at which you learn increases.
review.cons: Cons – SugarCRM can be expertised in max 6 months. Start exploring SOAP after that. That will add value to the work in the company.
review.advice-to-management: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
